paper.title: An Assessment of the IEC 1131-3 Standard on Languages for Programmable Controllers

author.org: University of Edinburgh The King’s Building

paper.venue: International Conference on Computer Safety, Reliability, and Security
paper.abstract: Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs) are playing an increasing role in the construction of safety critical systems. The standard IEC 1131–3 defines a number of interrelated languages for the expression of PLC programs.
